attributes.action: treat those veterans in receipt of war disablement pensions the same as those in receipt of state pensions and award them winter fuel allowance and cold weather payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those people whose only source of income is the War Disablement Pension for injuries received in service, do not receive Winter Fuel Allowance or cold weather payments. This unequality should be addressed and put right
